name: Underwriting standards
text: §431:12-112  Underwriting standards.  Every plan of mass merchandising and all rules and standards applicable to mass merchandising of insurance shall be subject to audit by the commissioner upon written request to the insurer.  No underwriting standard for risk selection under a mass merchandising plan shall be more restrictive than the standards used for insurance sold by methods other than mass merchandising. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2]
